title: "eds212-day3-task"
---

```{r}
#create 2 vectors
vec_a <- c(1,6)
vec_b <- c(2,4)
#combine the vectors together
a_plus_b <- vec_a + vec_b
b_minus_a <- vec_b - vec_a
four_a <- 4 * vec_a
a_times_b <- vec_a %*% vec_b
#show combined vectors. remember that %*% is how you do dot product.
a_plus_b
b_minus_a
four_a
a_times_b
```
